sentences: N. U. Unruh (born Andrew Chudy on June 9, 1957, in New York City, U.S.) is a German musician, experimental percussionist, and instruments inventor, probably best known for his work with German music group Einstürzende Neubauten.
In 1980, Unruh was a co-founder of the German band Einstürzende Neubauten, together with his school friend Blixa Bargeld.
